error_when_not_valid?()

Source: show 

# File lib/paperclip/matchers/validate_attachment_presence_matcher.rb, line 32
        def error_when_not_valid?
          (subject = @subject.new).send(@attachment_name).assign(nil)
          subject.valid?
          not subject.errors.on(:"#{@attachment_name}_file_name").blank?
        end
no_error_when_valid?()

Source: show 

# File lib/paperclip/matchers/validate_attachment_presence_matcher.rb, line 38
        def no_error_when_valid?
          @file = StringIO.new(".")
          (subject = @subject.new).send(@attachment_name).assign(@file)
          subject.valid?
          subject.errors.on(:"#{@attachment_name}_file_name").blank?
        end
